page.title: 13WROXALL ABBEY SCHOOL (2)
page.content:
{The school hall,}dining-room,common rooms and bedrooms are in the old house,while the classrooms are in the stable block and outbuildings. One classroom used to be a coachhouse, and another is still sometimes referred to as 'the onion shed'.
{The pupils}have changed a lot in recent years. They are happier than they used to be, and the atmosphere is not so strict. They used to have to wear hats in winter and boaters in summer.It is easier in general now for a child than it used to be. { {The School is quite isolated,}and it is a shame that the main A41 is at the end of the drive,as this means that the girls cannot go out for walks as they used to,because of the traffic.
